change.changenote: Section 4 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 341/2006 under RS1996-440-12, effective December 4, 2006 (BC Reg 341/2006).

section.sectiontext: Before making an order under section 3 or 6 in respect of a business, the Lieutenant Governor in Council may consider any recommendations made by the administrator in relation to the business' application.

change.changenote: Section 7 (6) BEFORE amended by 2003-52-470, effective January 1, 2004 (BC Reg 465/2003, repealing BC Reg 428/2003).

subsection.subsectiontext: If there is any conflict or inconsistency between

paragraph.paragraphtext: an order made under section 6 (1) and (2) for the purposes of section 6 (3), and
sections 360 and 363 of the Local Government Act, or any bylaw made under those sections,

change.subsandwich: the order made under section 6 (1) and (2) prevails.

change.changenote: Section 7 (6) (b) (i) BEFORE amended by RS2015-1-RevSch, effective January 1, 2016 [coming into force of RS2015-1].
